Server class

This server class acts as a communication interface through opc-ua. In its current state, it can accept Motion Events, forward it to the process planner and return some data from it.

class server.PipeLabServer(endpoint, name, model_filepath, process_planner)

Bases: object

async init()
send_motion_event()

Receives a motion event and sends it to the process planner. Returns some data from it.

Parameters

  • x¶ (int) – x-coordinate of the motion event position or a part id

  • y¶ (int) – y-coordinate of the motion event position

  • code¶ (int) – Motion event code (See Motion Event Codes)

async server.main(process_planner)
